title: Populate site content from uploaded resume screenshot

requirements.text: Extract resume details from the uploaded screenshot (Screenshot 2026-02-05 150324.png) and update the site’s content data model in frontend/src/resumeData.ts to match the resume, replacing the current placeholder person and entries.

quotes: this is the resume i want the website to have the info of

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/resumeData.ts no longer contains the placeholder identity (e.g., “Alex Johnson”) and is updated to reflect the uploaded resume (Fatima Chowdhury; Detroit, MI; email chowdhuryz313@gmail.com; education, experience, and skills from the screenshot).

Education entries include Wayne State University (BS in Computer Science; University Honors Co-Major; Anticipated 2029) and Cass Technical High School (Chemical/Biological; GPA 3.9; June 2025), preserving locations shown in the resume.

Experience entries include GDYT – The Lawn Academy (Employee; Hamtramck, MI; Summers 2023, 2024 & 2025) and Edible Arrangements (Employee; Detroit, MI; May 2024), with bullet points represented as highlights.
Skills are populated with the “TECHNICAL & PROFESSIONAL SKILLS” bullets from the resume.

requirements.text: Add support for a phone number in the resume data model and render it in the UI alongside existing contact information.

quotes: this is the resume i want the website to have the info of

acceptanceCriteria: The resume data model includes a phone number field populated with “(313)-419-2063” from the resume screenshot.
The phone number is displayed in at least one appropriate existing section that presents contact details (e.g., About and/or Contact).
If the phone field is empty, the UI does not render an empty label/value row for it.

requirements.text: Ensure sections gracefully handle missing/empty resume fields that are not present in the uploaded resume (e.g., projects and social links) by conditionally hiding empty sections/blocks and avoiding empty layouts.

quotes: this is the resume i want the website to have the info of

acceptanceCriteria: If resumeData.projects is empty, the Projects section does not render an empty grid on the page.
If a section is hidden due to empty content, the top navigation does not include a link to that hidden section.
If resumeData.contactLinks is empty, the Contact section does not render an empty “Connect With Me” area.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui must not be edited (compose them only).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend remains a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding a contact form that sends emails.
Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Inventing new resume content (projects, social profiles, certifications) not present in the uploaded resume screenshot.
